concept.title: Thermal protection
concept.shortdesc: Heat protection against burnup and cold protection against the void of space is provided by materials applied to the outer skin of the vehicle to maintain acceptable temperatures.

conbody.p: thermal protectionThe outside of the vehicle is made of aluminum and epoxy. Reentry temperatures can exceed 3000째 F1650째 C. Outside temperatures can plummet to minus 250째 F-155째 C.

Materials are used in a preferred order and include:
Reinforced carbon fiber.
High temperature reusable surface insulation.
Low temperature reusable surface insulation.
Specialized materials for other exposed internal surfaces.
Flexible surface insulation over standard shapes
Insulating blankets strapped to non-standard shapes
